channel.title: Report abuse. (Delta Source)
channel.description:
On my Delta source, i've realised that my Report Abuse doesn't work.
You can report, but I don't get a message through that somone has been reported, and it doesn't log the reports in any of my server files.
Anyone know how I can add it?
Thanks,
- RuneX -

item.title: Report abuse. (Delta Source)
item.dc:creator: @Majin_Buu Majin Buu
item.description:
@Majin_Buu wrote:

thats because there is missing code i guess

go to the report abuse void or w/e and make it log or tell the admins/mods e.g

or you can make a buffered writer to write the names of the reported player and which category he was reported in x log etc its not that hard if you look through the whole servers code

it’s all in there

Read full topic
